features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a contemporary take on traditional South Indian design. The necklace features intricately designed floral motifs encrusted with diamonds, leading to two grand pendants each centered with vibrant green Emeralds. Delicate South Sea Pearls are suspended as drops, adding a touch of elegance. The diamond setting employs a pavé style, maximizing the brilliance of each stone. The pendants embody Mandala-inspired patterns, bringing a traditional 'Kalpavriksha' feel.
colors: with striking emerald green accents and the soft iridescence of the South Sea Pearls.
occasions: and upscale social events. An ideal piece for Muhurtham ceremonies or a grand reception.
description: A magnificent blend of traditional Telugu artistry and modern elegance. This Haaram is not only a statement piece but also an investment in timeless beauty. The high-quality diamonds, emeralds, and pearls ensure enduring value, while the intricate design showcases the unparalleled craftsmanship of our artisans. Its unique blend of tradition and contemporary style makes it a versatile piece, suitable for both grand occasions and modern celebrations. It carries the cultural significance of the Kalpavriksha (Wish-fulfilling Tree) – symbolizing prosperity and good fortune.
